name: Backrooms Walking Simulator (General Red)
description:
Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Look - Mouse
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Unlock Mouse - Escape Key

How to Play:

This is a Walking Simulator, so simply walk around and enjoy the experience! When you're done, you can press escape to unlock the mouse and exit the game.

Disclaimer:

The MacOS build is buggy. There are small artifacts around the point lights in the game. This is due to an issue with the Godot 4 Beta Vulkan Renderer on MacOS. I will update it as soon as it's fixed. However, I recommend avoiding the MacOS build for now, if possible. The bug should not impact the gameplay, but the graphical glitches might get bothersome or cause flickering.
